entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
